titles: The complaint of Christmas, and the teares of Twelfetyde by Iohn Taylor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: Printed for Iames Boler, dwelling at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Includes: A Christmas carroll, to the tune of Poore Tom.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
